snippet: After the Jaguars decided not to draft Tim Tebow, what might have been is a subject that remains as polarizing in Jacksonville as the player.
abstract: Jacksonville Jaguars fans remain divided on whether the team should have drafted their native son Tim Tebow in 2010; Tebow, who is preparing with New York Jets for upcoming game against Jaguars, was taken at No. 25 by Denver Broncos and later traded to the Jets.
lead_paragraph: After the Jaguars decided not to draft Tim Tebow, what might have been is a subject that remains as polarizing in Jacksonville as the player.

headline.seo: Tebow Polarizes Fans Even in Jacksonville, His Hometown
headline.main: Tebow Divided Hometown Without Even Taking a Snap
headline.print_headline: Tebow Divided Hometown Without Even Taking a Snap
